description:
No more squealing, warbling or wobbling. SRAM's Centerline Rotor minimizes disc brake vibration by keeping the centre of friction consistent throughout the rotation. This means stable performance and a quieter ride. Rounded edges means easier installation and are UCI compliant.

  • 6-bolt, one-piece steel rotor
  • Compatible with road and mountain bikes
name: SRAM Centerline Rounded Disc Brake Rotor
